In England, in the seven days to 23 April, there were 111,524 new confirmed cases (197.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 16 April, there were 163,516 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 32% (51,992 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 28 April is 18,526,781 (32,761.7 cases per 100,000 population).
